original: Friberg, Ernst Ivar Birger Valfrid, landsfiskal. Horred, f. 20/4/99 i Råda s :n, Skarab. L, av kommin. Karl Valfrid F. o. Magda Lindgren. G. 31 m. Elsa Djureen. Barn: Sven-Ane f. 40: — Stud. v. h. allm. Ilärov. o. hand:-inst. samt genomg. bankkurs 10-19, landsfiskalsex. 28. Prakt, v. ordn:-o. krim:polis 21-23, tj :bitr. å lands-fiskalskont., e. o. tf. landskansl., bitr. o. tf. landsfiskal 24-36, landsfiskal i Bjärke distr. 36, i Horreds distr. sed. 41.
translated: Ernst Ivar Birger Valfrid Friberg was a district prosecutor born on April 20th, 1899 in Råda parish, Skaraborg county, Sweden. He was the son of the parish minister, Karl Valfrid F. and Magda Lindgren. He married Elsa Djureen in 1931 and had a son named Sven-Ane, born in 1940. Friberg studied at various institutions and underwent bank training from 1910 to 1919. He passed the district prosecutor exam in 1928. From 1921 to 1923, he practiced practical and criminal police work and worked as an assistant at the prosecution office. From 1924 to 1936, he worked as an assistant and substitute prosecutor for various districts before being appointed to the position of district prosecutor in Bjärke in 1936 and Horred in 1941.

education.name: Studied at various institutions and underwent bank training
